Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappe scored late on after Bradley Barcola fed him in the box.
Jonathan Clauss produced a thunderbolt from the edge of the box to give France some breathing space with 20 minutes to go.
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps will have been troubled by just how blunt his side were, especially in the first half. They found some fluency in the second period but he will know they must improve as Euro 2024 looms.
Miscellaneous Highlights: France laboured to a 3-0 win over Luxembourg in a Euro 2024 warm-up friendly.
Kylian Mbappe could have had a hat-trick had he had his shooting boots on.
Others: France dominated possession against Luxembourg but had very little to show for it.
Luxembourg frustrated a strong frontline throughout the first period.
